name: Space Tunes (Shadoz, CJAmbler, Coopah, Jayden McKay, AlgaeTorres, ChoppedLemon)
name_original: Space Tunes (Shadoz, CJAmbler, Coopah, Jayden McKay, AlgaeTorres, ChoppedLemon)
description:
Space Tunes is a voxel rhythm based gamed set in the far reaches of the galaxy. Destroy varying space debris and attempt to stop the evil beings that are lurking.

Game created as part of a 4 day game jam in class.
